Author: LastBlackUnicorn
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crypto Circle X - Most Advanced Crypto Exchange on the Blockchain
Body: CCX Pre-Sale Starts TOMORROW!  Our endeavor to bring a stable and useful product to the market to enable normal people to invest without fears of market manipulation, pump and dumps, and also have a fair chance to make money has reached the next level!  In the past month, our project has gained a wider exposure, with an increased interest gained from our beloved community. Our Private Sale concluded successfully, with 16,833,332 CCX Tokens sold. A big THANK YOU to everybody who decided to support us through the bearish market conditions and become a part of our project since its early stages!  We see ourselves as being one of the pioneers in the world of cryptocurrency where customer service is concerned. With our Crypto Circle eXchange, our goal here is to provide our customers a unique platform for buying and selling cryptocurrencies. With a platform that will educate new investors, and also make seasoned professional as well as institutional investors comfortable to trade without issues. This is the unique and exciting proposition available to those who invest in Crypto Circle eXchange‚Äôs token sale.  Our Pre-Sale starts tomorrow and you can get an extra 7% CCX tokens with every purchase! Head on to our official website: https://www.cryptocircle.exchange  Also, don‚Äôt forget to read our WhitePaper, if you haven‚Äôt already: https://www.cryptocircle.exchange/Whitepaper.pdf  If you happen to have any question, feel free to address us on our Telegram Group: https://t.me/CryptoCircleX_Official

Author: Crypto Circle X
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crypto Circle X - Most Advanced Crypto Exchange on the Blockchain
Body: CryptoCircle eXchange ICO is postponed to comply with the current market  Our dedicated and passionate team at CryptoCircle eXchange are working tirelessly to bring to the market a cryptocurrency exchange unlike any other, backed by a cutting edge technology that provides speed, safety, and scalability.  Ever since CryptoCircle eXchange was first conceived, we have worked tirelessly to enhance the functionality of our future service. In addition to this, our project is constantly being audited by our team as well as our advisors, together they provide us with helpful insights in future development. Combined, we were able to strengthen our business model and demonstrate its advantages to investors.  However, the crypto market has experienced drastic changes in the past year and we need to adapt to them. We will be postponing our ICO and work on adapting our product and prepare all aspects with details coming in the following months. This will allow us to enable key changes needed to our marketing strategy and help to expand project functionality as well as to secure the necessary needed legal support in key countries. We will have updates on our telegram announcement channel and other social media channels and please don‚Äôt forget we will have our daily quizzes and on going contests!  Thank you always, CryptoCircle eXchange Team  Follow our progress on our Telegram ANN Channel: https://t.me/CryptoCircleX_OfficialANN

Author: Tonisim
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crypto Circle X - Most Advanced Crypto Exchange on the Blockchain
Body: Crypto Circle eXchange: What‚Äôs New To our Loyal CCX supporters and Investors: https://medium.com/@CryptoCircleX/crypto-circle-exchange-whats-new-62111e94eeff  For most, a month might be a long period of time, depending on circumstances. For us, it has been short, as we have changed our brand to Crypto Circle eXchange CCX to improve our brand (We still use the CryptoCircleX brand as well), while excitedly waiting to unveil our work to everyone. We have been developing a new website; it is now chocked full of more information, it‚Äôs easier to navigate, to read, has more information and is much easier to understand. We even have an integrated blog in it along with a newsletter.  We also rewrote our white paper after collaborating with our expert advisors (who are very well versed in blockchain technology) and taking their advice. The new updated white paper goes in much more details regarding selective topics, but if our customers have any questions, we are always here, ready to answer anything related to Crypto Circle eXchange CCX. We have also upgraded our user dashboard so that upon purchase, our customers can instantly check and confirm on the blockchain that they have received their tokens.

Author: cryptorgenious
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crypto Circle X - Most Advanced Crypto Exchange on the Blockchain
Body: 10M Transactions using Golang and it's running on the Etherum network as a token ? Stay clear away from this. It's a scam. Golang uses DAG and IOT, similar to SKY. It cannot be mined. Also, if this is true how are you going to handle the smart contracts between each transaction ? The only company that has this technology for DAG is CNET and if they don't get their post-ICO price backup, the company is going to be bought very soon by NANO, IOTA, or AMB, possibly Amazon. CNET ICO'd at .000120000 STS's and is trading under .00000300 STS's due to the correction and downward pressure from Pissed Off ICO buyers.

On our website, you can see that we will launch an MVP in Q4 2018. Quote from: CharlesFol on September 10, 2018, 03:46:16 PM Who are your advisers? What do your advisers bring to the table? Are there any earlier backers of your business? What companies are you partnered with or seeking to partner with?  You can see the entire team on our website. You can even connect with them on linkedin.  Quote from: a264836321 on September 11, 2018, 05:31:36 AM I looked at your project carefully.I'm very interested in that.Still, a deeper understanding is needed before investing.After all, many ICO projects are now scams.So I became very cautious.I will invest in this project before your ICO is over.I hope your team can be more transparent about the progress of your project  We are transparent and you can always contact us on Telegram or LinkedIN (our linked in profiles are on the website) if you wish more insight into a particular detail.  Quote from: cryptorgenious on September 10, 2018, 04:08:38 AM 10M Transactions using Golang and it's running on the Etherum network as a token ? Stay clear away from this. It's a scam. Golang uses DAG and IOT, similar to SKY. It cannot be mined. Also, if this is true how are you going to handle the smart contracts between each transaction ? The only company that has this technology for DAG is CNET and if they don't get their post-ICO price backup, the company is going to be bought very soon by NANO, IOTA, or AMB, possibly Amazon. CNET ICO'd at .000120000 STS's and is trading under .00000300 STS's due to the correction and downward pressure from Pissed Off ICO buyers.  Hello sir, With your message, you prove that not only you have no idea about our project, but you lack basic knowledge about certain notions. First of all, it is 10 million transactions per second for the exchange transactional system. Second, the ERC 20 token is totally separate and has nothing to do with other aspects, unless using it for its utility function. Third, they are not mineable because we generate all tokens off during the token generation event. The team tokens (as you can see in our White Paper and website) equate 15% of the total of tokens, and only 25% of them are dispersed for 4 years until they are gone. And third of all, GoLang is a programming language. What you stated is like saying C++ belongs to some other token. Which is nonsense, just like your comment. Leaving such a comment with only 3 activity on Bitcoin Talk makes me wonder if you are not in fact a troll, whose mission is to denigrate good projects just because you can.

Body: Hello!  We will employ people who are native speakers of those languages.  Quote from: marcelo33 on September 07, 2018, 11:43:22 PM Hmm. Another cryptocurrency exchange. But It's interesting that you stated "Crypto Circle X will be live 24 hour customer service". What kind of service you mean here?     Hello, You can find all details in our White Paper.  Quote from: Pawarvivesh on September 08, 2018, 02:22:53 AM We are currently working on launching the bounty campaign. It will be launched really soon. Keep an eye on this thread to see when it opens up!  Huh? We already have a bounty. Bounty Thread - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4937028  Quote from: dinowage on September 08, 2018, 02:49:17 AM seeing from the concept of exchange offered by this project it is interesting and impressed to provide more benefits to prospective users in the future, hopefully the project gets a lot of support from investors.  Thank you!  Quote from: 101nowby on September 08, 2018, 02:55:23 AM I'm always glad that there is a new exchange platform. But I did not find what exactly makes your platform better than the existing ones, why should people choose you?  You can read all about it in our White Paper.  Just saying.  Quote from: profall on September 08, 2018, 03:14:37 AM brother, when will ICO start? I would like to buy some token in the ICO, have I join to white list? Do you have any airdrop or bounty campaign brother?  The ICO is currently in the Private Sale. If you wish to participate, you need to create an account on the website and pass the KYC. On our website, you can find all the relevant information about it. We do have a Bounty and an Airdrop. Bounty Thread - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4937028 Claim airdrop: https://t.me/CryptoCircleXAirdropBot  Quote from: nolaryanArlin on September 08, 2018, 03:18:05 AM pre-sale will soon be carried out and I hope the team can be broader and more interesting in promoting the project so that pre-sale gets a lot of support from investors.  Thank you! We've already went a long way since we started promoting our project only a few weeks ago. You can be a part of our Private Sale if you wish. All you need to do is to create an account on our website and pass KYC in order to participate.

Author: LastBlackUnicorn
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crypto Circle X - Most Advanced Crypto Exchange on the Blockchain
Body: Hello,  First of all, our ICO doesn't end until November 26, as seen on our official website.  We have no plans on pumping the token ever because it's unethical and unhealthy on the long run and we are not giving away worthless tokens. If you read our WhitePaper, you would see that we have token burn in place to ensure the stability of the token price.  Also, CCX is a utility token, not a security token.  We will release the tokens to bounty hunters after the token generation event. This is standard procedure. After seeing the ICO you are promoting in your signature, they do the exact same thing. How come you don't have an issue with them?

Author: LastBlackUnicorn
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crypto Circle X - Most Advanced Crypto Exchange on the Blockchain
Body: HELLO KURBANTH  We plan on being the top exchange in the market. We are focused on customer service, and making the user experience for cryptocurrency traders one of kind. We have features that most do not. For example: a trading bot, copy trading, technical analysis charts, social media integration and much more. Our token is an ERC20 token that is multifaceted. It is used for decreasing trade transactions down to 0.1% and with the affiliate system the percentage goes lower. The utility token can be used to vote for listing newer tokens to our ecosystem so that users get a say on what we list.  Finally, it can be used for the purchase of premium functions such as the features I mentioned above. Right now, if you purchase during our private sale, you will get 15% more tokens from your base purchase and if you wait until the presale it will only be 7%. If you really procrastinate and wait until our crowd sale, you will get no bonus. If you read our white paper and website and have any questions, please let us know. If you just have any questions in general, please let us know and always do your own research and make an educated decision.

Author: adriaymati58
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Crypto Circle X - Most Advanced Crypto Exchange on the Blockchain
Body: WEBSITE | WHITEPAPER | BOUNTY THREAD | TELEGRAM GROUP | TELEGRAM ANN | TWITTER | FACEBOOK | MEDIUM | YOUTUBE  The CCX Private-Sale is live with the Pre-Sale officially launching on 17'th September 2018!  Crypto Circle X is powered by a superior technological algorithm that is capable of high performance trading with over 10 million transactions per second, A.I. bot, auto-trading, professional charts with technical analysis, trading alerts, and much more, in a user friendly and responsive interface or in our specially designed mobile app.  What Makes Us Different?  Crypto Circle X's approach is to build an ecosystem centered on the needs of our customers. We aim to create a reliable, secure and trusted cryptocurrency exchange which is primarily focused on speed, safety, scalability, and Live 24 hour customer service.    About Crypto Circle X  Crypto Circle Exchange is the most advanced and secure cryptocurrency exchange powered by a cutting edge technology that is capable of over 10 million transactions per second. Our customers depend on us, as much as we, upon them. In this world of give and take, it has never been as transparent as right now, when dealing with our exchange. We want others to look at the symbol we have, and remember instantly our connection with our customers.  At its core, Crypto Circle Exchange is a revolutionary cryptocurrency and blockchain asset exchange focused on speed, safety, scalability, and customer support. We will issue our own token called the Crypto Circle X Coin, with CCX as the symbol. CCX is an ERC20 token running on the Ethereum blockchain.     CCX TOKEN Total Price in ETH 41,238 ETH amount of tokens may vary due to market price of ETH.        Crypto Circle X development RoadMap:
